name: Survey-2-Sale
author: Survey-2-Sale

sections.description:
Gather Insights. Increase Conversions. WOW Your Visitors

If you enjoy sales psychology you’re going to love Survey2Sale.

Completely customizable survey questions so you learn exactly what you want about your visitors.

Simple configurable delayed pop-up to grab your visitors’ attention

It’s as easy as installing a standard WP plugin.

Surveys are designed to look great on all mobile phones right out of the box Engaging your mobile visitors will lead to even more survey responses, email signups and sales! Mobile responsive functionality comes included automatically with no coding changes needed

Don’t take my word for it… This is incredible…I pride myself on seeing opportunities and this my friend is a WINNER! There’s two phenomenal results from Survey-2-Sale. Result #1, I received 98 responses in 4 days to very important questions that I’ve never known the answer to before.. Result #2, over $6,000 in passive sales that never would have happened without Survey-2-Sale. So Survey-2-Sale for me is just a WIN-WIN-WIN, collecting amazing information and having people actually purchase!

John Dumas
sections.installation:
1. Create your free Survey-2-Sale account via https://survey2sale.com/signup.html
  2. Upload the entire s2s folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Access the Survey-2-Sale menu item from \”Settings > Survey-2-Sale\”
  5. Click \”Enable Survey-2-Sale\”
sections.changelog:
1.1 Updated admin user interface elements.

1.0
Initial release of the Survey-2-Sale WordPress plugin.

short_description: A plugin that will DOUBLE your sales, accelerate your email list growth & reveal critical data about your customers!
